page.title: 05Recreation in our area.
page.content: Probably the main place for recreation in our area is the{ {Westerhope Community Centre}which consists of a brand new Asto-turf 5-a-side football pitch and tennis court. It also has a bowling green, full size football pitch and a youth club which organises trips. All ages can use the 'Tute', they go on trips all over. For the teenagers in the youth club there is pool, snooker, badminton, darts, a disco and a tuck shop. Just across the road is the Westerhope Golf Club. We asked the chairman some questions. He replied that there are 850 members in the club which is quite a lot. There are celebrity competitions every year when famous people play such as Jimmy Tarbuck.
